channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large amount of rubbish dumped, 9th November
item.description:
Large amount of rubbish and litter dumped in this layby

item.title: Drain covers sank causing lorrys to make loud bangs when driven over it, 9th November
item.description:
This has been getting worse in the last few months, in the evening we are constantly woken by lorries hitting the sunken drain cover its very loud.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 108 Cirencester Road, Charlton Kings

item.title: This car is blocking the pavement, 8th November
item.description:
This car has been left here for the last 3 to 4 weeks. It’s blocking the pavement - I couldn’t get a wheelchair past. There’s ample parking at the Racecourse, just 5 minutes walk away - why can’t it be left there instead?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 17 Walnut Close, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Found bicycle, 8th November
item.description:
We found this bicycle yesterday dumped in the stream. We fished it out and left it next to the bin beside the bridge over the stream.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Robert Burns Avenue, Cheltenham

item.title: Dangerous edge outside 12 Tennyson Road, 6th November
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 12 Tennyson Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Section of roundabout lights out, 4th November
item.description:

item.title: Road markings wearing off, 3rd November
item.description:
The writing at the junction which says right turn only with an arrow has started to wear away. Most people seem to ignore this anyway which is another issue. Maybe re paint it in bright yellow?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Zoons Court Roundabout, Hucclecote
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Traffic bollard, 3rd November
item.description:
